original_text: and be found in him, not having a righteousness of my own that comes from the law, but that which is through faith in Christ—the righteousness that comes from God on the basis of faith.
korean_text: 그 안에서 발견되려 함이니 내가 가진 의는 율법에서 난 것이 아니요 오직 그리스도를 믿음으로 말미암은 것이니 곧 믿음으로 하나님께로부터 난 의라

sentences.original_text: not having a righteousness of my own
but that which is through faith in Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도 안에 있는 믿음을 통한 의

sentences.original_text: the righteousness that comes from God
